titles: A serious search into Jeremy Ives's questions to the Quakers who are herein cleared from his scornful abuses : and Jer. Ives himself manifest to be no Christian from his own observations, reviling, ostentation, &c. / by a witness for Christianity in faith and life, George Whitehead.
author: Whitehead, George, 1636?-1723.
notes: Reproduction of original in British Library.
keywords: Ives, Jeremiah, fl. 1653-1674. --  Quakers no Christians.
